sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Image from "../../assets/cardimage"; import "./cards.css"; import Card from "@material-ui/core/Card"; import CardActions from "@material-ui/core/CardActions"; import CardContent from "@material-ui/core/CardContent"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import Typography from "@material-ui/core/Typography"; const cards = (props) => { let arr = [ "Sunday", "Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday", "Saturday", ]; // let day = arr[new Date(props.lists.dt_txt).getDay()]; return ( Word of the Day fg adjective well meaning and kindly.
{'"a benevolent smile"'} {/*

{day}

kjhkjhhhhhhhhhhh
{props.lists.main.temp} °C

{props.lists.weather[0].description}

Max : {props.lists.main.temp_max}
Min: {props.lists.main.temp_min}
Humidity: {props.lists.main.humidity}
Visibility: {props.lists.visibility}
*/} ); }; export default cards;
